title: Is it permissible to exchange study material with the opposite gender online? - assim al hakeem
transcript: sound Allah my question is permissible to like um exchange study papers with like the opposite gender without like like per WhatsApp without chit chatting or something or would that be like free mixing if this is public meaning if the group on WhatsApp or whatever uh uh chat group you're on and you ask for something publicly and everybody sees your message and it's not socializing or soft talking or uh flirting and someone from the opposite gender offers this and gives it to you publicly there's nothing wrong inshaallah with that
